group_1.textRight: Tell me your name.

group_1.textLeft: Masara...Kagami.

group_1.textRight: Now...
[flashEffect:flashWhite2][surround:4031A03]I can say goodbye to you, Masara Kagami.

group_1.textLeft: [flashEffect:flashRed2][surround:4031A09][bgEffect:shakeLarge][chara:302900:effect_shake]*Splutter*
It certainly seems that way.
Wow.

group_1.textRight: So that's how your magic works?

group_1.textLeft: Yes.
The power to disguise the truth.

group_1.textRight: A useful magic for someone in your position,@Meiyui.

group_1.textLeft: What are you implying?

group_1.textRight: Did it really work, though?

group_1.textLeft: My ability to distort perception can only@affect things or people close to me.
That's one of the conditions for using it. It@can be bothersome...but very effective.
It's not an illusion, more like an altering@of what is considered "truth".
What's more...
She seemed to sense that Masara was@present, as we suspected she might.

group_1.textRight: She did.

group_1.textLeft: Instead of only three Magical Girls, we@brought along Masara to make four.
That seemed to dispel her doubts about it@being false and added to the authenticity.
She also used up a great deal of magic in@her fight with Akira.
In her panic, she might have lost some of@her better judgment.
Meiyui, how are the other preparations@proceeding?
Ah, yes. Look for yourself.

group_1.textRight: A Kamihama social media page?
It was set up by Meiyui's friends.

group_1.textLeft: The Blue Seas Family.

group_1.textRight: We got this post up with their cooperation.
You're going to back Suzune into a corner?

group_1.textLeft: The very opposite.
We plan to have everyone in the Blue Seas@Family search for her.
But not so thoroughly that they catch her.

group_1.textRight: What do you mean?

group_1.textLeft: We will cast our net wide, but leave a gap@for her to wriggle free.

group_1.textRight: So you mean...

group_1.textLeft: If we challenge her face to face, someone is@going to end up dead.
Don't you agree, Akira? You were the one@who fought her, after all.

group_1.textRight: She was something else...
Really, really strong. And her attacks were@ruthless.
I could tell right away.
She was really trying to kill me with@everything she had.

group_1.textLeft: We want to minimize casualties on our end.
But that being said...
Killing her would be the last thing we want@to do.

group_1.textRight: Nanaka...

group_1.textLeft: But if we had no other choice... [chara:301600:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:301600:cheek_0][chara:301600:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:301600:lipSynch_1]No, I don't@think I could, even then.
I couldn't...kill someone.
So letting her leave is the best solution.@That's your conclusion.
Precisely.
I am sorry, Akira.
I took advantage of your feelings toward@Suzune to achieve this.

group_1.textRight: No, no, it's cool.
I made all these rash excuses for her, just@because I'd known her for an hour or two.
And it was rough, thinking Suzune could do@those kinds of things.
But I was wrong.
If I continued to believe her...
I could've gotten us all killed.
Is that why you didn't call Kako? To keep@her safe?

group_1.textLeft: The less Suzune knows about us, the better.

group_1.textRight: You're always so calm, Nanaka. You think@of the big picture...unlike me.
I really messed up. I'm terrible at this.

group_1.textLeft: Akira, no...
It won't help for you to moan about how@awful you are in comparison to her.

group_1.textRight: Huh?

group_1.textLeft: You can only be yourself.
Don't spend all your time wishing you were@more like someone else.
Look at the facts and decide what you can@do as yourself... Only that should matter.

group_1.textRight: Um, I think that was her trying to comfort@you.

group_1.textLeft: That was rather a cold way to do so.

group_1.textRight: It was because you fought with Suzune.
The plan succeeded because you wore her down@in the first fight.
It's because of you that Kokoro is alive.@So...thank you.

group_1.textLeft: She's right! Thanks a bunch!

group_1.textRight: Masara... Kokoro...

group_1.textLeft: They're right, Akira.
Also...
This may not be the last we see of that girl.
We need to be on guard from now on.

group_1.textRight: That's true.
So we're only okay for now.

group_1.textLeft: *Whimper*
By the way, Nanaka. Something has been@bothering me.

group_1.textRight: Oh?
